statements: SELECT * FROM knowledge_graphs
SELECT graph_name, created_date FROM knowledge_graphs
SELECT * FROM knowledge_graphs WHERE graph_id = 1
SELECT graph_name FROM knowledge_graphs ORDER BY created_date DESC
SELECT graph_id, graph_name FROM knowledge_graphs WHERE created_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM knowledge_graphs ORDER BY graph_id DESC;
SELECT graph_id, graph_name FROM knowledge_graphs WHERE created_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT graph_name FROM knowledge_graphs WHERE graph_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_graphs WHERE created_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY graph_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(graph_id) AS total_graphs FROM knowledge_graphs GROUP BY graph_id HAVING total_graphs > 1;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_nodes;
SELECT node_id, node_name FROM knowledge_nodes ORDER BY node_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_edges WHERE edge_type = 'parent-child';
SELECT node_id, node_name, node_type FROM knowledge_nodes WHERE node_type = 'concept' ORDER BY node_id ASC;
SELECT node_name FROM knowledge_nodes WHERE node_type = 'topic';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_nodes WHERE node_type = 'concept';
SELECT node_id, node_name FROM knowledge_nodes ORDER BY node_id DESC;
SELECT node_id, node_name FROM knowledge_nodes WHERE node_type = 'concept' AND node_id > 5 ORDER BY node_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_edges WHERE source_node = 1 AND target_node = 2;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_edges WHERE edge_type = 'related' ORDER BY edge_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes;
SELECT node_id, node_name FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes ORDER BY node_id DESC;
SELECT node_name, node_type FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes WHERE node_type='concept';
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraphEdges WHERE edge_type='related' ORDER BY created_date ASC;
SELECT node_id, property_key, property_value FROM KnowledgeGraphProperties ORDER BY property_key;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes;
SELECT node_id, node_name, created_date FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes WHERE node_type = 'Concept';
SELECT node_id, node_name, node_type FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes WHERE created_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT node_id, node_name, node_type FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes ORDER BY created_date DESC;

SELECT node_id, node_name, COUNT(*) AS Total_Properties FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes JOIN KnowledgeGraphProperties ON KnowledgeGraphNodes.node_id = KnowledgeGraphProperties.node_id GROUP BY node_id, node_name;
SELECT * FROM Entity;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM Entity WHERE entity_type = 'Person';
SELECT * FROM Relationship ORDER BY relationship_id DESC;
SELECT graph_name FROM KnowledgeGraph WHERE graph_id = 1;
SELECT e.entity_id, r.relationship_id FROM Entity e JOIN EntityRelationship er ON e.entity_id = er.entity_id JOIN Relationship r ON er.relationship_id = r.relationship_id;
SELECT * FROM Entity WHERE entity_type = 'Person';
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM Entity ORDER BY entity_name DESC;

SELECT entity_name, relationship_type FROM Entity JOIN EntityRelationship ON Entity.entity_id = EntityRelationship.entity_id JOIN Relationship ON EntityRelationship.relationship_id = Relationship.relationship_id;
SELECT entity_name, COUNT(*) FROM Entity GROUP BY entity_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT entity_type FROM Entity ORDER BY entity_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes;
SELECT node_id, node_label FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes WHERE node_id = 1;
SELECT node_label FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes ORDER BY node_label DESC;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraphEdges WHERE source_node_id = 2;
SELECT edge_label, source_node_id, target_node_id FROM KnowledgeGraphEdges WHERE edge_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes;
SELECT node_label FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes ORDER BY node_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraphAttributes WHERE attribute_name = 'example';
SELECT node_label, attribute_value FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes JOIN KnowledgeGraphAttributes ON KnowledgeGraphNodes.node_id = KnowledgeGraphAttributes.attribute_id;

SELECT * FROM KnowledgeGraphRelations WHERE source_node_id = (SELECT node_id FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes WHERE node_label = 'A') AND target_node_id = (SELECT node_id FROM KnowledgeGraphNodes WHERE node_label = 'B');
